title: Man pepper-sprayed during curfew acquitted by jury of disorderly charge
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun: Breaking - Today 
Larry Lomax, who was pepper-sprayed after confronting Baltimore Police during an April protest, was acquitted by a jury of a disorderly cond...
